content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I executed a shell command to check the value of PYTHONPATH, which returned an empty string. Then, I exported the PYTHONPATH variable with the path to the arcgis module, but the command returned an empty string. Finally, I executed Python code to generate a web map of rivers in the USA using the arcgis module. The code added a feature layer to the map and saved it as "River Map".
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "echo $PYTHONPATH"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb'\\n'\nSTDERR:\nb''", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "export PYTHONPATH=$PYTHONPATH:/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/arcgis"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb''", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_code", "args": {"code": "#!/usr/bin/env python\\n\\nimport sys\\n\\n# Add the path to the \'arcgis\' module\\nsys.path.append(\'/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/arcgis\')\\n\\nfrom arcgis.gis import GIS\\nfrom arcgis.mapping import WebMap\\n\\n# Connect to ArcGIS Online\\ngis = GIS(\\"https://www.arcgis.com\\", \\"username\\", \\"password\\")\\n\\n# Create a new web map\\nweb_map = WebMap()\\n\\n# Add a feature layer to the map\\nweb_map.add_layer({\\"type\\": \\"FeatureLayer\\", \\"url\\": \\"https://services.arcgis.com/V6ZHFr6zdgNZuVG0/arcgis/rest/services/USA_Rivers_and_Streams/FeatureServer/0\\"})\\n\\n# Save the web map\\nweb_map.save(item_properties={\\"title\\": \\"River Map\\", \\"snippet\\": \\"A map of rivers in the USA\\"})", "basename": "generate_river_map"}}}', type='ai_response')]
"""
